weka.clusterers

Class DBACluster.AntHill

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.clusterers.DBACluster.AntHill
  • Enclosing class:
    DBACluster

    protected class DBACluster.AntHill
extends java.lang.Object
    The AntHill contains all the ants. The clustering process is executed here.

    The AntHill also can perform simple management tasks on the ants, like addressing and calling them, but of course it must not manage the ants in a way that this class becomes a global control unit for the ants, e.g. it must not tell the ants where to go to.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize(double alpha,
                       weka.core.Instances data,
                       int numAnts,
                       int antsCallPerCycle,
                       double antViewRange,
                       int antsAssumeGlobalAfterNumCalls,
                       double foiRaiseTolerance,
                       double foiNoiseThreshold)
        Initializes the AntHill with start parameters for a clustering task.
        Parameters:
        alpha - the alpha value to use during clustering
        data - the Instances to be clustered by the DBACluster.AntHill.Ants in this AntHill.
        numAnts - how many ants should work on the clustering task
        antsCallPerCycle - how many ants to call in one ant cycle
        antViewRange - the view range of the ants in this AntHill
        antsAssumeGlobalAfterNumCalls - after how many ant calls in series an observed behavior is assumed to be global.
        foiRaiseTolerance - tolerated raise of the local similarity during the clustering process
        foiNoiseThreshold - threshold for regarding InstancePlaceholder objects with a low local similarity value as noise.
        See Also:
        alpha, instancePlaceholders, ants, antsCallPerCycle, DBACluster.AntHill.Ant.viewRange, DBACluster.AntHill.Ant.autoShutdownAfterNumIdleCalls, DBACluster.AntHill.Ant.foiRaiseTolerance, DBACluster.AntHill.Ant.foiNoiseThreshold

      • setAlpha

        Parameters:
        alpha - alpha value to be used for clustering.
        See Also:
        initialize(double, Instances, int, int, double, int, double, double)

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Tells if this AntHill is active.
        Returns:
        true, if the AntHill is active, false if not, e.g. if it was shut down.

        Returns:

      • runAntCycle

        public void shutdown()
        Shuts this AntHill down after a clustering task.

      • getClusterAssignments

        public int[] getClusterAssignments(int maxClusterNum)
                            throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Tells the result of an executed clustering task.
        Parameters:
        maxClusterNum - maximum number of clusters in the returned result. A limitation is set, if this parameter is not -1.
        Returns:
        an array with InstancePlaceholder index to cluster index association.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the AntHill is still active, and therefore the clustering task may not be finished yet.
